description: This file provides utility functions for filtering, sorting, and counting products based on various criteria such as categories, sizes, colors, price ranges, and badges. It supports parsing multi-select query parameters and applying multiple filters to product lists.

methods.name: parseMulti(qs, key)
methods.description: Parses multi-select query parameters supporting both repeated keys (?k=a&k=b) and comma-separated single values (?k=a,b). Returns an array of unique strings.

methods.name: applyFilters(products, selected)
methods.description: Filters a list of products based on selected criteria like families, sizes, collections, colors, badges, and price ranges.

methods.name: sortProducts(list, sortKey)
methods.description: Sorts a list of products based on specified sort key such as price ascending/descending, new, or best seller, with stable tie-breaking.

methods.name: countByFacet(products, facets)
methods.description: Counts the number of products for each facet category (families, sizes, collections, colors, price ranges, badges).
